overview: Fred Hanuschek is our chief financial officer of CTI Group, with over 20 years financial experience with public, multinational and high technology companies. Prior to joining CTI Group, Mr. Hanuschek served as chief financial officer for ICC Technologies, Inc. and IGI, Inc. , both publically-listed companies. Earlier in his career, Mr. Hanuschek served as senior audit manager at Coopers & Lybrand. Mr. Hanuschek is a certified public accountant, holds a bachelorâ€™s degree from Pennsylvania State University and has completed international business studies at the University of KÃ¶ln, Cologne, Germany. He also is an active member of the American and Pennsylvania Institutes of Certified Public Accountants
